content:
hl7-fhircast-bot opened Issue #230

## May 2019 Ballot Comment:

Submitted by @euvitudo
Chapter/section:
Url: https://fhircast.hl7.org/specification/May2019Ballot
Type: A-S Clarification

Summary:

Comment: Suggest consistent use of reference to standard protocol.

Existing wording: OAuth 2.0 or OAuth2.0 or OAuth2
Proposed wording: OAuth 2.0

_This issue was imported by @hl7-fhircast-bot from the consolidated FHIRcast May 2019 ballot spreadsheet._

wmaethner commented on Issue #230

During conversation at the Montreal, May 2019 working group meeting, @wdvr, @isaacvetter , @NiklasSvenzen and myself talked through this issue and would like to propose:

Proposed resolution: Persusasive

We will update all references to OAuth to OAuth 2.0 as proposed.

wmaethner commented on Issue #230

## Montreal May 2019 Working Group Vote

Isaac Vetter moved the following disposition, seconded by Niklas Svenzen

Disposition: Persuasive
Disposition Comment: Will fix as described

:+1: For: 12
:expressionless: Abstain: 0
:-1: Against: 0

:tada: The motion passed! :tada:
